name: Phantasia (itch)
description:
A student project for the course "Visual aesthetics" focused on the user experience towards exploration and curiosity.

The game is still very early in development around four weeks, and will likely not be continued on for a while since we're still studying. But we still would like your honest opinion about the game, mechanics and what you think about the experience as a whole.

Thank you for playing our game!

 To follow us and our other student projects go to https://twitter.com/ManaBrigade
